Contact Us

#### Josh Schroeder

Mayor

Email

[josh.schroeder@georgetowntexas.gov](mailto:josh.schroeder@georgetowntexas.gov)



Address

[808 Martin Luther King Jr. St., Georgetown, TX](https://georgetowntexas.gov/)


![](https://georgetowntexas.gov/_assets_/images/aside-box-icon.png)

* Mayor


Mayor
=====

2nd Term
**Term Expires:**
May 2026
![photo: Mayor Josh Schroeder outside Georgetown city council chambers](https://georgetowntexas.gov/Images/Government/Mayor/Josh%20Schroeder%20outside%202.jpg?t=202508061738440)

Josh Schroeder is a shareholder at Sneed, Vine & Perry, P.C., where his practice focuses on assisting clients in a wide range of transactional business matters, from formation to operation to sale, with a particular emphasis on real estate development.

Having grown up in Taylor, Texas, Josh graduated with a B.A. with honors, from The University of Texas at Austin, in 1998. He received his J.D. from The University of Texas School of Law, 2002.  He was admitted to the State Bar of Texas in 2002.

#### **Offices Held and City Boards**

Josh has served on the following community non-profit boards:
Josh has served on the following City Boards and Commissions:

With the approval of HB 1082 in May 2021, all elected officials' personal information is to be redacted from any public documents.
[View redacted campaign finance and expense reports through the City Secretary Records.](https://www.georgetowntexas.gov/government/secretarys_office/locate_city_records.php)
